ENABLE_IMAGE_WRITE:

for RAM-disken.

Du vil skru på lagringstillatelser
for EmuNAND lvl0.
ENABLE_SYSNAND_0_WRITE:
Du vil skru på lagringstillatelser
for SysNAND lvl0.
ENABLE_EMUNAND_1_WRITE:
You want to enable EmuNAND
lvl1 writing permissions.
 
This enables you to modify
recoverable system data,
user data & savegames.
ENABLE_SYSNAND_1_WRITE:
You want to enable SysNAND
lvl1 writing permissions.
 
This enables you to modify
system data, installations,
user data & savegames.
ENABLE_GAMECART_SAVE_WRITE:
You want to enable gamecart
save writing permissions.
ENABLE_SYSNAND_2_WRITE:
!Better be careful!
 
You want to enable SysNAND
lvl2 writing permissions.
 
This enables you to modify
irrecoverable system data!
ENABLE_MEMORY_WRITE:
!Better be careful!
 
You want to enable memory
writing permissions.
 
Writing to certain areas may
lead to unexpected results.
ENABLE_SD_DATA_WRITE:
!THIS IS NOT RECOMMENDED!
 
You want to enable SD data
writing permissions.
 
Everything here is encrypted.
It is recommended to use the
A:/B: drives for modification
of installations, user data &
savegames instead.
ENABLE_SYSNAND_3_WRITE:
!THIS IS YOUR ONLY WARNING!
 
You want to enable SysNAND
lvl3 writing permissions.
 
This enables you to OVERWRITE
your bootloader installation,
essential system files and/or
BRICK your console!
